name: AzureDevTestLabsPopulateEnvironment
description: Create an Azure DevTest Labs Environment and populate with Azure Resource Management template
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure RM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to configure before running.

inputs.name: LabId
inputs.label: Lab Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of an existing lab in which the lab VM will be created. This is a pick list generated as a result of selecting an **Azure RM Subscription**.

inputs.name: RepositoryId
inputs.label: Repository Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of an existing repository from wich you want to pick a template. This is a pick list genereted as a result of selecting a lab.

inputs.name: TemplateId
inputs.label: Template Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of an existing template that should be used to create a new environment. This is a pick list generated as a result of selecting a repository.

inputs.name: EnvironmentName
inputs.label: Environment Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the environment to create.

inputs.name: EnvironmentParameterFile
inputs.label: Environment Parameter File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to a ARM template parameters file that provides parameter values for the environment template.

inputs.name: EnvironmentParameterOverrides
inputs.label: Environment Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set parameter values needed by the environment template. Parameter values set by parameters file will be overridden.

inputs.name: EnvironmentTemplateOutputVariables
inputs.label: Create output variables based on the environment template output?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Capture environment template output as build/release variables.

inputs.name: StoreEnvironmentTemplate
inputs.label: Create artifact based on the environment template output?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Capture environment template output as build/release artifact.

inputs.name: StoreEnvironmentTemplateLocation
inputs.label: Build store location
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location to store the template.

inputs.name: EnvironmentTemplateLocationVariable
inputs.label: Template Output name for location
inputs.helpMarkDown: The output name for the location to store the template.

inputs.name: EnvironmentTemplateSasTokenVariable
inputs.label: Template Output name for the SAS token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The output name for the SAS token.

inputs.name: LocalTemplateName
inputs.label: Local Template Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to an ARM template to add to the environment.

inputs.name: LocalParameterOverrides
inputs.label: Local Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set parameter values needed by the local template. Parameter values set by parameters file will be overridden.

inputs.name: LocalTemplateOutputVariables
inputs.label: Create output variables based on the local template output?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Capture local template output as build/release variables.

outputVariables.name: environmentResourceId
outputVariables.description: Capture the created lab environment ID

outputVariables.name: environmentResourceGroupId
outputVariables.description: Capture the created lab environment resource group ID

instanceNameFormat: Create and Populate Azure DevTest Labs Environment
